title: I can't see the game at all!

embed.description: Post with 1 views. Shared by foolishdomin8tor. issues with league

body: I can log into League with no problems, go through champ select and the works, but as soon as it goes into the loading screen/the actual game, the screen jumps into a corner and I can only see the chat and champion picture. I've tried restarting the client, restarting my computer, but it just goes back to being stuck in a corner.

replies.body: Hopefully you've found the workaround!  If not, tap Alt+Enter in-game to toggle your screen to Windowed mode.  This will help until we get a more permanent fix.
